com.plexus.sam.config
Class StaticConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.plexus.sam.config.StaticConfig

public class StaticConfig
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains a number a static (hardcoded values). Mainly the path to the main configuration XML file.

Author:
plexus
